      about: "के बारे में",
      moderation: "संचालन",
      privacy: "गोपनीयता",
      multilingualAutoTranslate: "बहुभाषी स्वचालित अनुवाद • लॉगिन की आवश्यकता नहीं",
      tryOnCampus: "कैंपस में आजमाएं",
      qrDescription: "हार्वर्ड यार्ड प्रवेश द्वार के पास QR कोड स्कैन करें ताकि यह पेज तुरंत आपकी भाषा में खुल जाए।",
      shareUrl: "visitors.harvard.edu/chat",
      searchPlaceholder: "संदेश खोजें...",
      filterByLanguage: "भाषा के अनुसार फिल्टर करें",
      allLanguages: "सभी भाषाएं",
      sortBy: "क्रमबद्ध करें",
      newest: "नवीनतम",
      mostPopular: "सबसे लोकप्रिय",
      mostHelpful: "सबसे उपयोगी",
      userProfile: "उपयोगकर्ता प्रोफ़ाइल",
      settings: "सेटिंग्स",
      notifications: "सूचनाएं",
      darkMode: "डार्क मोड",
      lightMode: "लाइट मोड"
    }
  }
};
i18n.use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({
  resources,
  fallbackLng: 'en',
  debug: false,
  interpolation: {
    escapeValue: false
  },
  detection: {
    order: ['localStorage', 'navigator', 'htmlTag'],
    caches: ['localStorage']
  }
});
export default i18n;

sourcesContent:
import i18n from 'i18next';
import { initReactI18next } from 'react-i18next';
import LanguageDetector from 'i18next-browser-languagedetector';

// Translation resources
const resources = {
  en: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "Connect with Fellow Harvard Tourists",
      subtitle: "Ask questions, share tips, and discover hidden gems around Harvard Yard. Chat in any language with automatic translation.",
      joinForum: "Join the Tourist Forum",
      autoTranslate: "Auto-Translate",
      instantHelp: "Instant Help",
      qrAccess: "QR Access",
      autoTranslateDesc: "Chat in your language, read in others'. Seamless translation for everyone.",
      instantHelpDesc: "Get real-time answers from fellow tourists who've been there.",
      qrAccessDesc: "No app needed. Just scan and start chatting instantly.",
      bestPhotoSpots: "Best Photo Spots",
      tourRecommendations: "Tour Recommendations",
      multiLanguage: "Multi-language",
      realTimeChat: "Real-time Chat",
      harvardTouristChat: "Harvard Tourist Chat",
      backToLanding: "Back to Landing",
      welcomeToChat: "Welcome to Harvard Tourist Chat!",
      welcomeDesc: "Ask questions, share tips, and connect with fellow visitors. All messages are automatically translated to your selected language.",
      askQuestion: "Ask a question or share a tip...",
      writeReply: "Write your reply...",
      pressEnter: "Press Enter to send • Shift+Enter for new line",
      replyingTo: "Replying to",
      reply: "Reply",
      upvote: "Upvote",
      justNow: "just now",
      minutesAgo: "{{count}}m ago",
      hoursAgo: "{{count}}h ago",
      daysAgo: "{{count}}d ago",
      communityAnswers: "{{count}} community answers shared today · Be the next to help!",
      about: "About",
      moderation: "Moderation",
      privacy: "Privacy",
      multilingualAutoTranslate: "Multilingual auto-translate • No login required",
      tryOnCampus: "Try it on campus",
      qrDescription: "Scan a QR sign near Harvard Yard entrances to open this page instantly in your language.",
      shareUrl: "visitors.harvard.edu/chat",
      searchPlaceholder: "Search messages...",
      filterByLanguage: "Filter by language",
      allLanguages: "All Languages",
      sortBy: "Sort by",
      newest: "Newest",
      mostPopular: "Most Popular",
      mostHelpful: "Most Helpful",
      userProfile: "User Profile",
      settings: "Settings",
      notifications: "Notifications",
      darkMode: "Dark Mode",
      lightMode: "Light Mode",
      // Posts
      question1: "Where is the best place to take a group photo?",
      question2: "Family-friendly restroom near Harvard Yard?",
      question3: "Quick lunch nearby that students actually like",
      question4: "Is there a visitor center with maps and information?",
      answer1: "The steps of Widener Library at golden hour.",
      answer2: "Northwest corner of the Yard facing Massachusetts Hall.",
      answer3: "Smith Campus Center, 1st floor — clean and accessible.",
      answer4: "Clover or Felipe's roof if weather is nice.",
      answer5: "Smith Campus Center has a great visitor info desk on the first floor!"
    }
  },
  es: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "Conecta con Turistas de Harvard",
      subtitle: "Haz preguntas, comparte consejos y descubre joyas ocultas alrededor de Harvard Yard. Chatea en cualquier idioma con traducción automática.",
      joinForum: "Únete al Foro de Turistas",
      autoTranslate: "Auto-traducción",
      instantHelp: "Ayuda Instantánea",
      qrAccess: "Acceso QR",
      autoTranslateDesc: "Chatea en tu idioma, lee en otros. Traducción fluida para todos.",
      instantHelpDesc: "Obtén respuestas en tiempo real de otros turistas que han estado ahí.",
      qrAccessDesc: "No se necesita app. Solo escanea y comienza a chatear al instante.",
      bestPhotoSpots: "Mejores Lugares para Fotos",
      tourRecommendations: "Recomendaciones de Tours",
      multiLanguage: "Multi-idioma",
      realTimeChat: "Chat en Tiempo Real",
      harvardTouristChat: "Chat de Turistas de Harvard",
      backToLanding: "Volver al Inicio",
      welcomeToChat: "¡Bienvenido al Chat de Turistas de Harvard!",
      welcomeDesc: "Haz preguntas, comparte consejos y conéctate con otros visitantes. Todos los mensajes se traducen automáticamente a tu idioma seleccionado.",
      askQuestion: "Haz una pregunta o comparte un consejo...",
      writeReply: "Escribe tu respuesta...",
      pressEnter: "Presiona Enter para enviar • Shift+Enter para nueva línea",
      replyingTo: "Respondiendo a",
      reply: "Responder",
      upvote: "Me gusta",
      justNow: "ahora mismo",
      minutesAgo: "hace {{count}}m",
      hoursAgo: "hace {{count}}h",
      daysAgo: "hace {{count}}d",
      communityAnswers: "{{count}} respuestas de la comunidad compartidas hoy · ¡Sé el siguiente en ayudar!",
      about: "Acerca de",
      moderation: "Moderación",
      privacy: "Privacidad",
      multilingualAutoTranslate: "Auto-traducción multilingüe • No se requiere registro",
      tryOnCampus: "Pruébalo en el campus",
      qrDescription: "Escanea un código QR cerca de las entradas de Harvard Yard para abrir esta página instantáneamente en tu idioma.",
      shareUrl: "visitors.harvard.edu/chat",
      searchPlaceholder: "Buscar mensajes...",
      filterByLanguage: "Filtrar por idioma",
      allLanguages: "Todos los Idiomas",
      sortBy: "Ordenar por",

      mostPopular: "Más Populares",

      userProfile: "Perfil de Usuario",
      settings: "Configuración",
      notifications: "Notificaciones",
      darkMode: "Modo Oscuro",
      lightMode: "Modo Claro",
      // Posts
      question1: "¿Cuál es el mejor lugar para tomar una foto grupal?",
      question2: "¿Baño familiar cerca de Harvard Yard?",
      question3: "Almuerzo rápido cerca que les guste a los estudiantes",
      question4: "¿Hay un centro de visitantes con mapas e información?",
      answer1: "Los escalones de la Biblioteca Widener en la hora dorada.",
      answer2: "Esquina noroeste del Patio frente al Massachusetts Hall.",
      answer3: "Smith Campus Center, 1er piso — limpio y accesible.",
      answer4: "Clover o el techo de Felipe's si hace buen tiempo.",
      answer5: "¡Smith Campus Center tiene un excelente mostrador de información para visitantes en el primer piso!"
    }
  },
  zh: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "与哈佛游客交流",
      subtitle: "提问、分享建议，发现哈佛园周围的隐藏宝藏。使用任何语言聊天，自动翻译。",
      joinForum: "加入游客论坛",
      autoTranslate: "自动翻译",
      instantHelp: "即时帮助",
      qrAccess: "二维码访问",

      instantHelpDesc: "从去过那里的其他游客那里获得实时答案。",

      realTimeChat: "实时聊天",
      harvardTouristChat: "哈佛游客聊天",
      backToLanding: "返回首页",
      welcomeToChat: "欢迎来到哈佛游客聊天！",
      welcomeDesc: "提问、分享建议，与其他游客交流。所有消息都会自动翻译为您选择的语言。",
      askQuestion: "提问或分享建议...",
      writeReply: "写下您的回复...",
      pressEnter: "按Enter发送 • Shift+Enter换行",
      replyingTo: "回复给",
      reply: "回复",
      upvote: "点赞",
      justNow: "刚刚",
      minutesAgo: "{{count}}分钟前",
      hoursAgo: "{{count}}小时前",
      daysAgo: "{{count}}天前",

      about: "关于",
      moderation: "审核",
      privacy: "隐私",
      multilingualAutoTranslate: "多语言自动翻译 • 无需登录",
      tryOnCampus: "在校园试试",
      qrDescription: "扫描哈佛园入口附近的二维码，立即以您的语言打开此页面。",
      shareUrl: "visitors.harvard.edu/chat",
      searchPlaceholder: "搜索消息...",
      filterByLanguage: "按语言筛选",
      allLanguages: "所有语言",
      sortBy: "排序方式",
      newest: "最新",
      mostPopular: "最受欢迎",
      mostHelpful: "最有帮助",
      userProfile: "用户资料",
      settings: "设置",
      notifications: "通知",
      darkMode: "深色模式",
      lightMode: "浅色模式",
      // Posts
      question1: "哪里是拍集体照的最佳地点？",
      question2: "哈佛园附近有适合家庭的洗手间吗？",
      question3: "附近学生真正喜欢的快速午餐",
      question4: "有带地图和信息的游客中心吗？",
      answer1: "黄金时段的威德纳图书馆台阶。",
      answer2: "庭院西北角面向马萨诸塞大厅。",
      answer3: "史密斯校园中心一楼——干净且无障碍。",
      answer4: "如果天气好的话，试试Clover或Felipe's的屋顶。",
      answer5: "史密斯校园中心一楼有一个很棒的游客信息台！"
    }
  },
  th: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "เชื่อมต่อกับนักท่องเที่ยวฮาร์วาร์ด",
      subtitle: "ถามคำถาม แชร์เคล็ดลับ และค้นพบสถานที่ซ่อนเร้นรอบๆ Harvard Yard แชทด้วยภาษาใดก็ได้พร้อมการแปลอัตโนมัติ",
      joinForum: "เข้าร่วมฟอรั่มนักท่องเที่ยว",

      shareUrl: "visitors.harvard.edu/chat",

  hi: {
    translation: {

};

i18n
  .use(LanguageDetector)
  .use(initReactI18next)
  .init({
    resources,
    fallbackLng: 'en',
    debug: false,
    interpolation: {
      escapeValue: false,
    },
    detection: {
      order: ['localStorage', 'navigator', 'htmlTag'],
      caches: ['localStorage'],
    },
  });

export default i18n;
